name: playAnimation(_:transitionDuration:blendLayerOffset:separateAnimatedValue:startsPaused:clock:)
desc: Plays an animation with the specified options.
declaration: @discardableResult func playAnimation(_ animation: AnimationResource, transitionDuration: TimeInterval = 0, blendLayerOffset: Int = 0, separateAnimatedValue: Bool = false, startsPaused: Bool = false, clock: CMClockOrTimebase? = nil) -> AnimationPlaybackController
